name: Dumpster Dash
description:
Dumpster Dash is a fast paced "tap" style game that tests how quickly you can react to new obstacles. Compete with your friends to see who can grab the most dumpsters before the time runs out or you accidentally send little Fluffy or Spot to heaven.

Features

  1. GameJolt Leaderboard Support
  2. GameJolt Trophies / Achievements
  3. Available in HTML5, Unity Web Player and as a standalone. (HTML5 and Unity Web player may not function properly due to browser incompatibilities.)

Now Available on Android!
Dumpster Dash is available with full Google Play Services integration. (Leaderboard and Achievements). Download and play today!
